thread.title: Dale and Patricia
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Dale and Patricia

author: Dale and Patricia
title: Dale and Patricia
text: The sales consultant that helped us added an extended warranty to our invoice without even asking if we wanted it. The warranty was good and we get store credit if we don't use it in 3 years, but she just added it without asking. We know how extended warranties work and if we did that without asking our customers, we wouldn't have a job. She should not just assume everyone wants it.
